EmailTemplate.description: Notifying Project Manager/Other On Project Manager feedback cancellation when mentor completes KRA
EmailTemplate.name: Notifying Project Manager/Other On Project Manager feedback cancellation
EmailTemplate.subject: Performance: KRA Feedback On {!PM_Configure__c.Mentee__c} Canceled For The Project {!PM_Configure__c.Project_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PM_Configure__c.Reporting_Contact__c},
We hope this message finds you well.
This is to inform you that, {!PM_Configure__c.Mentor__c} has decided to proceed with providing the KRA feedback for the {!PM_Configure__c.Mentee__c} without your KRA feedback. As a result, your feedback record has been cancelled by the system.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding. Thank you for your consideration.
Best Regards,
Cloud Peritus Team
